response.original_title: Daniel Tigers Neighborhood: Neighborhood Friends Collection
response.overview: Learn all about friendship and helping one another with Daniel Tiger! Join Daniel as he uses his imagination to play "outer space" with Miss Elaina, celebrates Prince Wednesday's birthday with his friends at the castle, and more in these eight fun-filled stories that teach children all about cooperating, playing together, and helping out your neighbors!
response.title: Daniel Tigers Neighborhood: Neighborhood Friends Collection
